message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.NE, cs.RO 

The paper discusses machine learning techniques and their potential to learn abstract perceptual notions, which suggests it could fall under the categories of artificial intelligence (cs.AI), machine learning (cs.LG), computer vision (cs.CV), neural and evolutionary computing (cs.NE), and robotics (cs.RO). The focus on learning and perception makes cs.AI and cs.LG the most likely categories, followed by cs.CV due to the mention of sensory information. The mention of sensorimotor theory and the potential for unsupervised learning techniques also suggest cs.NE as a possible category, while the simulation aspect could place it under cs.RO.
